params.creationCode: The creation code of a hook contract
params.deployer: The address that will deploy the hook. In `forge test`, this will be the test contract `address(this)` or the pranking address                 In `forge script`, this should be `0x4e59b44847b379578588920cA78FbF26c0B4956C` (CREATE2 Deployer Proxy)
params.salt: The salt used to deploy the hook

computeAddress(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Precompute a contract address deployed via CREATE2
